summary.description:
Accessing biological data in R with semantic web technologies.

Linked Open Data platform for EBI data.

The EBI RDF Platform aims to bring together the efforts of a number of EMBL-EBI resources that provide access to their data using Semantic Web technologies. It provides a unified way to query across resources using the W3C SPARQL query language. We welcome comments or questions via email rdf-req[at]ebi.ac.uk or github
summary.name: rrdf
